sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The alsa-driver package contains the alsa sound card drivers and include files.

sect3.title: alsa sound card drivers
sect3.para: These are kernel modules which provide audio and MIDI functionality to the operating system.

sect3.title: include files
sect3.para: These are installed in /usr/include/sound and are required to compile certain packages such as alsa-lib.
